full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 2kg Pair (2 x 2kg), Blue Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Slip Coated Grip, Cast Iron Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for women and men

reasoning.keyword_integration_strategy: Integrated top-volume keywords 'dumbbells set', 'dumbbells', 'weights', and 'for women/men' by structuring the title around natural product descriptors. Used '2kg pair' format to capture '2kg dumbbells pair' searches. Wove in 'hand weights', 'home gym equipment', and 'fitness training' as natural use-case phrases.
